abstract: Australian tennis player Nick Kyrgios is fined $10,000, maximum allowable for for verbal abuse or unsportsmanlike conduct, for 'insulting comment' made to Stan Wawrinka at Rogers Cup; is additionally fined $2,500 for comment made to ball person during match.
lead_paragraph: A month after Kyrgios’s racket-smashing, profanity-laced run at Wimbledon, he was back at the center of a storm after making unsavory remarks to Wawrinka during a match Wednesday.

headline.main: Nick Kyrgios Fined for ‘Insulting Remark’ Toward Stan Wawrinka
headline.print_headline: Kyrgios Is Fined $10,000 for Remarks to Wawrinka

snippet: A month after Kyrgios’s racket-smashing, profanity-laced run at Wimbledon, he was back at the center of a storm after making unsavory remarks to Wawrinka during a match Wednesday.
